answers.answer: I got night sweating too.  Do you feel your heart beats very fast or your chest vibrates during sweating?  I have a while with blowing bubbles in my hands and legs.  Dr found out because I got diabetes.

No, I don't have the quickened heart beat or the chest vibrations. I am also having a hard time gaining weight. I was/am anorexic and am trying to gain b/w 8-10 pounds. I have increased my caloric intake but it doesn't seem to be helping. I'm also exhausted by the end of the day.

question: I'm hoping someone may have some advice. I have a very healthy diet, get regular exercise - but I have a really bad problem with gas that builds throughout the day. I drink two travel size cups of coffee and chew a lot of sugarfree gum every day. The rest of my diet consists of yogurt, trail mix, granola bars, PB&J, fruit, and a lot of water. I can feel bubbles of gas popping in my stomach and sometimes fear that it will force itself out at the wrong time. I have BMs nearly every time I go to the bathroom.  I also have frequent night sweats when I wake up drenched in sweat. HELP!
title: Gas, gurgling stomach, night sweats?
